description:
The day before the live show where Project Himmel`s new unit "LUNA ω rabbits" are revealed, Mei gets a slight fever and has to stay in bed.
Worried about her, Satori and Rinne take turns visiting and talk about a side of Rie that Mei didn`t know yet.
Having been together with Rie since her childhood, hearing this warms Mei`s heart.
Source: crunchyroll
